tooltips.restart-subscription: Your subscription will restart without any additional billing.

TeamInvitationPage.invitation-accepted: Invitation accepted, please create an account and log in to finalize the invitation. You will be redirected to the account creation page.
TeamInvitationPage.invitation-accepted-2: Invitation accepted, please log in to your account to finalize.

TeamInvitationPage.invited-with-different-email: You are logged in with a different e-mail address from the one that received the invitation.
TeamInvitationPage.logged-in-with-right-email: You are logged in with the correct e-mail address, but you must log out and then log back in to accept the invitation.
TeamInvitationPage.please-logout: Please log in with the corresponding e-mail address and return to this page. If you do not have an account with the invited address, please log out and return to this page to create one.

VerifyEmailPage.request-new-validation: and request a new validation link if you have not yet validated it.

error.token-not-created: An error occurred while creating the verification token. Please try again.
error.unknown-error: We have encountered an unknown error. Please try again or contact us.
error.user-already-exists: This e-mail address is already registered. If you are the owner, please log in with this address or, if necessary, request a password reset.
error.user-not-created: An error occurred during account creation. Please try again.

Welcome {varIntlName} ! Thank you for your trust. You will receive an e-mail with a link to confirm its validity.
